conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Hi Jeremy, we noticed a $142 charge from 'Techtronix Store' on your card ending in 4892. Was this you?

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Got it — I'll block the transaction immediately and start a quick review.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Verified — this transaction qualifies for dispute under Visa Rule 4863. Proceeding with claim.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Policy confirmed — low-risk case, eligible for instant refund per regulatory guidelines.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: $142 has been credited back to your account. Your new card will arrive in 3 business days.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: I've automatically reconnected Netflix, Spotify, and your childcare payment to your new card.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Case closed ✅ This outcome has been added to our fraud prevention models to protect you better.
